Name: Assam
Description: From the Black Tea family that is harvested from some parts of India and China. Has a earthy and grainy taste. Recommended as it has contents that can reduce plaque formation, bacteria growth and promote healthier teeth and gums.

Name: Black Blend
Description: A mix of Black Tea leaves that has a stronger and bitter taste. Recommended during winter time as the black tea has contents that can help warm up the body faster.

Name: Ceylon
Description: From the Black Tea family that is harvested in Sri Lanka. Has a hint of sweetness and vanilla taste. Recommended can provide a natural energy boost and improve mental alertness and focus.

Name: Green Blend
Description: A mix of Green Tea leaves that has a lighter taste and smell. Recommended during the summer time as it helps with hydration with cooling and refreshing contents.

Name: Jasmine
Description: From the Green Tea family that has a hint of sweetness and flowery taste. Recommended as it can help with relaxation and reduce stress.

Name: Genmaicha
Description: From the Green Tea family that contains roasted brown rice. A Japanese classic type of tea. Recommended as it has fiber content that can help with digesting.

Name: Roasted Oolong
Description: From the Oolong Tea family that has roasted tea leaves which have a richer aroma and stronger taste. Recommended throughout the year as Oolong has mixed benefits of warming up the body and has a lighter taste.

Name: Peach Oolong
Description: From the Oolong Tea family that has a rich woodsy flavor with notes of ripened peaches and a sweet honey finish. Recommended throughout the year as Oolong has mixed benefits of warming up the body and has a lighter taste.

Name: No Milk (Water)
Description: Calorie free. Recommended if you have acne problems and want to stay hydrated.

Name: Powder Milk
Description: Good source of protein, which is essential for muscle growth and overall body function. Contains vitamins and minerals such as calcium, vitamin D, potassium, and magnesium.

Name: Whole Milk
Description: Gives good source of energy. Can be beneficial for individuals who have increased energy needs, such as growing children, or those who require additional calorie intake.

Name: Almond Milk
Description: Reduces the intake of unhealthy fats and promotes heart health. Rich in vitamin E.

Name: Coconut Milk
Description: Contains fibers that can support digestive health by promoting regular bowel movements and provides nourishment for beneficial gut bacteria. Rich in vitamins B, C, and E.

Name: Oat Milk
Description: Regulates blood sugar as it has fibers that can slow down the absorption of glucose. Rich in calcium, vitamin D, and B12.

Name: Soy Milk
Description: Balances hormones. Low in calories, which can help in managing appetite. Rich in calcium and vitamin D, which help for stronger bones and teeth.

Name: Rice Milk
Description: Easily digestible. Naturally low in saturated fat and cholesterol, which can be beneficial for heart health and may reduce the risk of heart disease.

Name: Regular Ice
Description: Recommended if you want a cool and chilly beverage on a hot day. Having ice in the drink can help with hydration.

Name: Less Ice
Description: Recommended if you want a cool and chilly beverage. Having ice in the drink can help with hydration.

Name: No Ice
Description: Recommended on colder days. Warmer drinks can help with digestion as it may help relax the muscles in our digestive system.
